00022 typedef struct {
00023   int normal;
00024   int npoints;
00025   double range;
00026 } densparameters;
00027 
00028 
00029 static void ob_spindensx(densparameters* par,
00030                          const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00031                          const GaussianAux* X, complex double* dens)
00032 {       
00033   int v = par->normal;
00034   int n = par->npoints;
00035   double xmax = par->range;
00036   int i,j,k;
00037   double x[3];
00038   int vx, vy;
00039   complex double rho;
00040 
00041   if (v==0) {
00042     vx = 1; vy = 2;
00043   } else if (v==1) {
00044     vx = 0; vy = 2;
00045   } else {
00046     vx = 0; vy = 1;
00047   }
00048 
00049   for (j=0; j<n; j++)
00050     for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00051 
00052       x[v] = 0.0;
00053       x[vx] = -xmax+2*xmax*i/(n-1);
00054       x[vy] = -xmax+2*xmax*j/(n-1);
00055 
00056       rho =
00057         cexp(-0.5*(csqr(x[0] - conj(G1->b[0]))+csqr(x[1] - conj(G1->b[1]))+
00058                    csqr(x[2] - conj(G1->b[2])))/conj(G1->a)
00059              -0.5*(csqr(x[0] - G2->b[0])+csqr(x[1] - G2->b[1])+
00060                    csqr(x[2] - G2->b[2]))/G2->a)*X->T;
00061       for (k=0; k<3; k++)
00062         dens[k+(i+j*n)*3] += 0.5*rho*X->sig[k];
00063     }
00064 }
00065 
00066 
00067 static void ob_spindensp(densparameters* par,
00068                          const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00069                          const GaussianAux* X, complex double* dens)
00070 {       
00071   int v = par->normal;
00072   int n = par->npoints;
00073   double pmax = par->range;
00074   int i,j,k;
00075   double p[3], p2;
00076   int vx, vy;
00077   complex double rho;
00078 
00079   if (v==0) {
00080     vx = 1; vy = 2;
00081   } else if (v==1) {
00082     vx = 0; vy = 2;
00083   } else {
00084     vx = 0; vy = 1;
00085   }
00086 
00087   for (j=0; j<n; j++)
00088     for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00089 
00090       p[v] = 0.0;
00091       p[vx] = -pmax+2*pmax*i/(n-1);
00092       p[vy] = -pmax+2*pmax*j/(n-1);
00093         
00094       p2 = p[0]*p[0]+p[1]*p[1]+p[2]*p[2];
00095 
00096       rho= 
00097         cpow32(conj(G1->a)*G2->a)*
00098         cexp(-0.5*conj(G1->a)*p2 + 
00099              I*(p[0]*conj(G1->b[0])+p[1]*conj(G1->b[1])+p[2]*conj(G1->b[2]))
00100              -0.5*G2->a*p2 
00101              -I*(p[0]*G2->b[0]+p[1]*G2->b[1]+p[2]*G2->b[2]))*X->T;
00102       
00103       for (k=0; k<3; k++)
00104         dens[k+(i+j*n)*3] += 0.5*rho*X->sig[k];
00105     }
00106 }

00110 void calcSpinDensitiesCoordinate(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00111                                  int v, int n, double x, double* dens)
00112 {
00113   densparameters P = { normal: v, npoints: n, range: x };
00114   OneBodyOperator op_ob_dens = {dim: 3*n*n, opt: 1, par: &P, me: ob_spindensx};
00115 
00116   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_dens, dens);
00117 }
00118 
00119 
00120 void calcSpinDensitiesMomentum(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00121                                int v, int n, double p, double* dens)
00122 {
00123   densparameters P = { normal: v, npoints: n, range: p };
00124   OneBodyOperator op_ob_dens = {dim: 3*n*n, opt: 1, par: &P, me: ob_spindensp};
00125 
00126   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, X, &op_ob_dens, dens);
00127 }
